name: Diseased Dinner
description:
⚠️The title screen button is a little weird so just try to click around the bottom of it⚠️

Oh No! Your food is infected with a parasite! Now your only choice is to destroy all of it!

There was a parasite going around town and it finally got to you, sadly there was not way out of it and you have to destroy all of the food.

Credits:

Thank you to some of my friend who made some of the foods.

Music from Bensound.com

Everything else by me

Levels:

Level 1 - Basic Start

A simple start that showcases all of the food.

Level 1 Night - A Challenging Start

A simple level with a challenging time limit.

Level 2 - Lights Out

The lights are out so use your mouse as a lantern to find your way.

Level 2 Night - AHHHH MY EYES!!!

A very bright level where you have to depend on the audio to know where the powerbomb is.

Level 3 - Criss Cross

Instead of tiny bombs around there is direction bombs to use.

(Also there are many watermelons)

Level 3 Night - AHHHH MY EYES!!!

Use the direction  bombs to clear the cherries under the strict time limit.

(Also very dark)
